summary: Jeevan HealthCare at Home platform with live booking flows, doctor/admin dashboards, CRM integration, test catalog, and health packages.

existing_features.title: Update the global theme so that any UI currently using the Jeevan green/teal brand color is rendered in Medical Blue instead, across all pages and dashboards.

Ensure Tailwind theme tokens and utilities remain consistent after the color change by updating the CSS variables used by Tailwind (e.g., `--secondary`, `--accent`, related chart tokens) so charts/badges/status elements no longer use green.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update platform theme: change green UI color to Medical Blue (site-wide branding update).
